text: @jswatz @Fahrenthold If people really are getting COVID19 at beaches then this whole "safer outdoors" thing is BS and you are not safer for eating at a restaurant patio either. Especially an enclosed with plastic restaurant patio like 'Margarita Factory' up the road from me where it's been packed.
